summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 34th Avenue Northeast, from East 50th Street to University View Place; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 185204 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
